forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 45. North northeast wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 57, with temperatures falling to around 54 in the afternoon. North wind around 8 mph.

weather_report:
As the evening unfolds in Downtown San Francisco, a gentle veil of clouds tucks the city into a cool embrace. The temperature dips to a comfortable chill, hovering around 45 degrees, as a light north-northeast wind whispers through the streets. The clouds are proof of the lingering marine layer, hinting at a night where hidden beauty lies just beyond the fog’s soft shroud. While the stars may play coy behind the cover, the twinkling city lights cast a warm glow, inviting evening strolls by the waterfront or cozy gatherings at your favorite café.

As dawn breaks over the city, expect the clouds to part, giving way to a mostly sunny day that promises a high near 57. By afternoon, the temperatures will mellow to about 54, creating an inviting ambiance for leisurely pursuits. With a crisp breeze accompanying clear blue skies, it’s a fantastic time for a visit to one of the neighborhood parks or a stroll along the Embarcadero, where the beauty of the bay awaits. Dressing in layers—perhaps a light sweater or jacket—would be wise, allowing you to adapt to the coolness of the morning as it warms into a pleasant winter day. Embrace the opportunity for a casual exploration of nearby shops or the serenity of reading in a sun-dappled corner of the city.
